goodness - they really were pioneers!

comment.author: 13978050@N03
comment._content: Nowadays we have things they didn't, a partial list. Running water, insecticide, hot showers. solid walls. deodorant,  and the list goes on.  It makes me think of the bedbugs they fed each night.  I wont deny it was a grand time though.  14 hour days and all.
